website_summaries.verdict: Fair-skinned customers will especially love this palette's crease-free finish. Though vibrant, the hues don't show up as well on darker skin.
pros: Eight cool tones of creamy powder eyeshadow
Customers describe finish as shimmery, but not excessively sparkly
cons: Colors do not work as well on darker skin tones
Some say it's not as long-wear as they would expect

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Highly pigmented, no primer or brush needed, and stays in place all day. Great pallet for winter skin tones. Love the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Austin

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t blend, broken color
customer_reviews.text: This just didn’t seem like high quality, expensive, eyeshadow to me. I like tarts tinted moisturizer and cheek tint so thought I’d like it. It just doesn’t go on smoothly at all, very hard to blend. Also, one of them colors, probably the one I’d use most often as a base color was cracked when I opened the package. Wish I hadn’t let the return window go by.
customer_reviews.author: Mamamouse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love these eyeshadows, they are creamy and pigmented and the beautiful packaging is a plus too
customer_reviews.author: racquel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this compact this time..
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying and super disappointed in this compact ... last one the colors went in beautifully, no smudging or powder “spray” from the brush. This one is completely opposite! Sprays everywhere and color smudges and streaks making it hard to work with. Really disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stannard

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is well pigmented and applies smoothly and stays on well. The colors are gorgeous and you can create many looks with the different shades. Love this product !
customer_reviews.author: Sheri AZ

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I love tarte cosmetics & this truly did not disappoint. The case/presentation is stunning. And I LOVE the colors, they are beautiful. And the quality is fabulous too. And I love that they are gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Color pay off not very good. I have other Tarte palettes and they are great. I wouldn’t recommend this one, colors are light and chalky when applied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Pallette
customer_reviews.text: Great for every day neutral eye-- I combine with brighter pallets for a more glam look, but overall a great, compact pallet with mirror.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Ehret

customer_reviews.title: Love Tarte
customer_reviews.text: I love Tarte products. The palate is really beautiful and can be made to be as bold or as subtle as needed. Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane in Alb.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this palette! So pigmented and blends out so well and stays on literally all day without using eyeshadow primer. One of the best palettes I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: ashle pulsifer

customer_reviews.title: nice palette colors!
customer_reviews.text: bought for a birthday gift. was in good condition and shipped quickly
customer_reviews.author: MermaidKeyla87

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a more natural look and this fits the bill. I have a dark skin complexion and this palette is well pigmented, and beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Ivania

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: The case it came in was just as amazing as the eye shadow colors!
customer_reviews.author: Xandria Rae Fowler

customer_reviews.title: I only like the packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is either expired or fake. “You get what you pay.”
customer_reviews.author: LiStokes

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite!!
customer_reviews.text: This is AMAZING!! I'm more of a Too Faced type but I'm soooo in love with this palette, its definitely my new favorite!! Very high pigmented, and hardly any falls off while applying! True meaning of a little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: Misty Asplund

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Appearance is very pretty. Easy to use and goes on nicely
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Neutral shades
customer_reviews.text: I use this compact all the time. Love the colors
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: It was shipped undamaged and was a beautiful case!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for my sister in-law law! She recognized it right away and was gushing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All broken
customer_reviews.text: This was not packaged right both brown colors were broken this was a gift for my Grand daughter in my So it is very hard to return. To me This is a little expensive for the size to absorb. Won't buy again
customer_reviews.author: wanda l.

customer_reviews.title: Came as expected
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it for a birthday gift. My sister absolutely loved it. Very happy with my order
customer_reviews.author: Emilyne

customer_reviews.title: My second one
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have bought. Pigment of the eyeshadows is amazing. They last all day. Love the color palette.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Atherton

customer_reviews.title: Neutral
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors I feel like the wear is not as long lasting as Urban Decay brand. But it’s not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Not as pigmented as i thought. if you are ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as pigmented as i thought. if you are of a darker skin tone this product is definitely not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Toni-Ann Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love the colors
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this palette. Colors are very pretty and pigmented. Stays on for a long time. Totally worth the $$.
customer_reviews.author: wajia z

customer_reviews.title: TARTE is my favorite eye shadow brand and these colors are all you ...
customer_reviews.text: GORGEOUS Palette of colors. TARTE is my favorite eye shadow brand and these colors are all you need!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful case
customer_reviews.text: This eye shadow was beautiful. The case even more so. I love it and recommended you buying it if you love Tart products.
customer_reviews.author: Christy D.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful long lasting colors
customer_reviews.text: Great product-highly pigmented and so smooth going on-lasts all day-lovely product!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M. Tocco

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth and does not crease or clump through out your dayall day wear
customer_reviews.text: Love the color palette and the color stays all day.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Crap compared to Urban Decay
customer_reviews.text: Crap compared to Urban Decay. I covered this palette for month and it was a huge let down. I only like a few of the shades. Not as pigmented if soft as UD. I'm running back to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ferris Beashau

customer_reviews.title: I wonder if this make up is old because some people really like it but when I got mine it was barely ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely does not compare to a naked palette ... I wonder if this make up is old because some people really like it but when I got mine it was barely pigmented You could get a better pallet somewhere else sad because I like this brand to ☹️ A lot of the brown colors look more Orange brown 🤨😑 I would just say it’s ok but not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tarte came through!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Valentine's day gift for my girlfriend and she cannot put it down! I'm no expert but the colors look amazing on her and seem to last all day. Definitely happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: The price was perfect and she loves the product
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what my daughter wanted! The price was perfect and she loves the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this palette. Its a great selection of colors and the shimmery colors are very pigmented.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great for 40+ crowd
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for highly pigmented neutral pallet that was not overly sparkly against my 44 year old skin. This is it. I tried both this an the Naked Ultimate. This is more pigmented and shows wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Stunning
customer_reviews.text: Stunning colors for every color of your wardrobe. It just may be the best pallete I’ve purchased. Doesn’t get everywhere while applying. Will definitely re-order
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time to buy a Tarte product and I absolutely love it. I was worried the power may come in cracked or broken, but it arrived in great condition. It also comes with a instruction page for some cute eye ideas to use with the colors. I have used it 4 days this week and the product shows up great on my fair skin.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Red

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for everyday looks
customer_reviews.text: Love this brand. The quality is great, the colors are beautiful, and I could not be happier with the packaging and delivery. I wanted an eyeshadow pallet for everyday and this one was an awesome choice. I can go natural or a bit bold. Use wet for a deeper color payoff or dry for lighter looks. Not much fallout, which is great!
customer_reviews.author: Karissa

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: These colors stay on all day and the set is a good combo of options. I feel like it's good value, but if you are traveling light, it's not light. Recommend for the lovely case and colors and quality. Happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Julie I Sedell

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The color's arent as pigmented as I would've imagined coming from Tarte. The quality of the container itself including the mirror is really great though. The lighter colors are really nice. The darker colors take a lot of product to reach the full effect however.
customer_reviews.author: William Mowery

customer_reviews.title: You'll love this palette!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this palette!! The colors are vibrant and easily blended for the perfect look. You will not be disappointed with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: AChamp

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful container and excellent colors.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful container for eye shadow I have ever seen and the colors are wonderful. I will purchase this brand again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: dragonlady

customer_reviews.title: Tarte Rainforest of the Sea eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I like these colors. They're more glittery than I expected. I'm only using a couple of the colors because of this. I suggest buying shadows you've never worn at a store so you can see them first hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these neutrals!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the colors and quality. Nice pigmentation so you don't need to apply as much. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Highly pigmented, silky smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, highly pigmented colors without that chalky buildup you get from other eyeshadows. You have to use very little of these shadows which makes them well worth the price! I really love this brand of shadows!
customer_reviews.author: Robin McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Just as Good as Urban Decay Naked Palette
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Naked palettes for awhile but I couldn’t find a legit seller on Amazon so I bought this compact and I like it just as much (and it costs less). The colors are very pretty, they blend well and are easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Pamplemousse

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are rich and beautiful. This product goes on smoothly and doesn’t crease much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are vibrant and last all day! First time buying their product and I’m hooked! Stunning case as well!
customer_reviews.author: Teri P.

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous new you
customer_reviews.text: love the colors and love the texture! so happy i get no irritation from these products!
customer_reviews.author: JL514

customer_reviews.title: Broken DISAPPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Broken in the box. So disappointed. Update: second pallet received as replacement was also broke.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Cute packaging but I can’t see the colors on my eyelids!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute packaging but the pigmentations are bad. I have to apply a big amount on my eye to show a bit color!
customer_reviews.author: Elly

customer_reviews.title: Nice palette
customer_reviews.text: I love this palette. It is high quality. Lasts all day long. Very worth the money spent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I expected a dryer powder but it’s kind of “buttery” and thick with a bit more sheen.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful palette!!
customer_reviews.text: Palette was in tact and absolutely gorgeous! Highly pigmented and blends like silk. This palette was everything I anticipated and more! So happy with my purchase! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: DanaL.

customer_reviews.title: The new neutrals
customer_reviews.text: The pallet it’s self is beautiful. Eye shadow colors are true to the photos. I was also impressed with the coverage , which is long lasting and the finish is smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Walsh-gammon

customer_reviews.title: Love Tarte!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are pretty and apply nicely. Compact is beautiful too!
customer_reviews.author: PerfectStranger

customer_reviews.title: Not as vibrant as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I thought the eyeshadow would be more vibrant looking. It looked brighter in the picture. I’m still going to use it though.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Beane

customer_reviews.title: Improper shipping
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered item twice. Both times shadows are broken in compact.
customer_reviews.author: Pgauder

customer_reviews.title: Another great Tarte pallet!
customer_reviews.text: So far, every Tarte eyeshadow pallet I’ve purchased has been spot on! Gorgeous colors, blends out beautifully. The Vol 2 Rainforest of the Sea I bought because of the blues. They’re gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: Blythe Manor

product_meta.title: Tarte Rainforest Of The Sea Eyeshadow Palette Vol. II Limited-Edition
product_meta.description: Creasefree eyeshadow palette with the best-selling creamy powder formula in eight new, cool-toned shades
feature_bullets: Tarte Rainforest Of The Sea Eyeshadow Palette Vol. II Limited-Edition

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
